items.sentence: Tom asked Mary when the last time she had bought a book was.
Tom asked Mary whether she knew what she was supposed to do.
Tom admitted that he was the one who stole Mary\'s bracelet.
Tom and Mary acted like they\'d never met each other before.
Do you really think I\'d rather live in Boston than Chicago?
Do you want me to talk to Tom about what\'s going to happen?
I can\'t believe your parents let you come here by yourself.
Mary\'s stew was so delicious that Tom had a second helping.
Everyone should periodically receive a physical examination.
Fortunately, today Tom is much better than he was yesterday.
